name: The Last Solver
description:
The Last Solver

The light is gone.

You are the last solver existing and everything is in your hands.
Different section of puzzles to explore
you need to solve the puzzles to bring the light back...

The Last Solver is a single-player game based on solving puzzels,
You have to solve different puzzels in every section to activate that sections laser light
after activating all laser light you will reach your goal.
